author: courant.com
title: Pictures: Southington Apple Harvest
text:
Caption hc-pictures-southington-apple-harvest-20151010 Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant hc-pictures-southington-apple-harvest-20151010 Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See more galleries The 47th annual Southington Apple Harvest was held on Oct. 2 to 4 and Oct. 9 to 11 and attracted thousands of people for food, live music, pie eating contests, entertainment and rides in the downtown district.
Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant
